Posts.Content: waiting on the day of this new experience is the worst, I have just completed chemo, radiation and will take herception until January 2010. It's not something to look forward to,but I can tell you it's very doable. Just try to "FACE IT, FIGHT IT AND FORGET IT" this is my motto that I'm living by. J
Posts.Title: So scared, alone and need to RELAX....HELP
